summary: A promise I'll try to keep - CyberpunkThot - Cyberpunk 2077 (Video Game) [Archive of Our Own]
title: A promise I'll try to keep - CyberpunkThot - Cyberpunk 2077 (Video Game) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Cyberpunk 2077 (Video Game)
Rating: Mature
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Meredith Stout/Female V
Characters: Meredith Stout, Female V - Character
Additional Tags: kinda established relationship, Foot rubs, Serious Talks, Feelings, Night City is not a place for romance, Or Is It?, Valentines Day was made by the Corporations!, OOC, Not really canon compliant because I know of no canon, let me live
Summary:

Meredith Stout and V have a strange arrangement between them. All is fine until V starts pushing for more. But how will Meredith react.

They are from different world but live in the same City. Things are always easier said than done.

Shoutout to @speedcore70 for all the help!

summary: Amanda and Stacy finish up their Frankengame by pitching their imaginary games. Will their games sell based off of their...
body:
Amanda and Stacy finish up their Frankengame by pitching their imaginary games. Will their games sell based off of their individual pitch? Will they make millions of dollars? Take a listen to find out!

Do you like this episode? Wanna complain about something we got wrong? Let us know what you think by dropping a comment below or emailing us at info@templeofgeek.com. We really want to hear your opinions!

Subscribe: iTunes / Google Play / Stitcher

summary: Don’t know why, probably because of that one tweet, but I started to think about my future Cyberpunk OC.  Don’t know what class...
body:
Don’t know why, probably because of that one tweet, but I started to think about my future Cyberpunk OC. 

Don’t know what class they’ll be, but fixer and netrunner smeem kinda cool - if there will be the exact same class variety as in 2020 - but I’m leaning more into the fixer corner. Probably a woman, still, it’s not definite yet, I’m not sure about it. But I’ve got a name for them.

Maverick Vogel.

summary: So I think my blog truly needs to change. While I’m still an avid reader and obsessive quote collector, I have also shifted a...
caption:
So I think my blog truly needs to change. While I’m still an avid reader and obsessive quote collector, I have also shifted a lot of my energy to furthering my YouTube channel and Mixer/Twitch streams. Art and indie games have taken over a very large portion of my priorities. So with that being said, a name change will occur very soon. @critical-reader will remain my “Booklr” blog. This blog, however, will focus a lot on what else I’m doing in my real life. 

So to start…

Cyberpunk 2077, 12″x12″, Pencil on Paper

2 hours.

Time Lapse: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7IJ553j7G8

Likes, subs, and follows are ALWAYS appreciated.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 llegara a la Epic Games Store y también a Steam y GOG
title: Cyberpunk 2077 llegara a la Epic Games Store y también a Steam y GOG
body:
Toda la información en: https://hardwaresfera.com/noticias/videojuegos/cyberpunk-2077-llegara-a-la-epic-games-store-y-tambien-a-steam-y-gog/

Finalmente los desarrolladores de Cyberpunk 2077 han decidido que el juego llegue a la Epic Games Store, GOG y Steam, sin exclusividad. La decisión de Deep Silver y 4A Games de lanzar en exclusiva Metro Exodus en la Epic Games Store les ha salido cara. Han sido muchas las críticas a los d…

blog.name: darklyfantastic
blog.title: Darkly Fantastic
blog.description:
Have you been looking for a place that is both informative and fun, when it comes to geek culture, gaming and pop-geek culture?

We entertain geeks and nerds of all stripes, ages and constructs, from the perspective of a crusty old school nerd and his contemporary team of reviewers, players and geeks.

• We play, review and comment on table top role-playing games like Dungeons & Dragons, Vampire: the Masquerade, as well as old school games like Boothill, Traveler and Chill.
• We read, review, react to and comment on all kinds of fantasy and sci-fi books and graphic novels.
• We share tips on writing fiction and fan fiction and share our experiences.
• We play, react to, review and comment on Video Games, television/web shows, and movies in the Geek collective 
• We comment and rant on overall geek related topics and culture.

blog.name: thestrelaz25
blog.title: TheStrela
blog.description: Звать Владлен, кидаю сюда всякие истории из жизни, мемчики ну и конечно же свое "авторитетное" мнение. Разрабатываю свою игру.

summary: Похоже сладенький, ты очень сильно ждёшь игру Cyberpunk 2077 (году выйдет ебать). На какой год ставишь дату выхода?
question: Похоже сладенький, ты очень сильно ждёшь игру Cyberpunk 2077 (году выйдет ебать). На какой год ставишь дату выхода?
answer:
Не то, что сильно жду, это игра номер один для меня в данный момент. (по ожиданию, она даже The Last Of Us part 2 обогнала для меня) Ибо я всегда был огромным фанатом киберпанка. (Не как все эти псевдо фанаты, которые стали таковыми после трейлера киберпанка и даже не смотрели бегущего по лезвию). Я не могу дождаться уже, я хочу уже окунуться в этот мир антиутопии полностью и на долго.

Думаю она выйдет не раньше 2021 года, в лучшем случае. Геймплей который был показан в августе прошлого года ещё очень сырой и игру ещё делать и делать.

summary:
Cyberpunk 2020 | View from the Edge sourcebook
If you’re like me and want to write fics for Chberpu k 2077 (even though the damn...
body:
Cyberpunk 2020 | View from the Edge sourcebook

If you’re like me and want to write fics for Chberpu k 2077 (even though the damn game ain’t even out yet), here’s a near list of places of interest. This is from a Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook. The second pic is a layout of the city, not sure how much inspiration the Chberpunk 2077 team are taking from the original but it will be interesting to see what they include from the source material.

The Afterlife: the bar mentioned in the gameplay video is number 57 if you’re interested.

What’s the most interesting sounding place on this list do you think?

blog.name: neonandsynth
blog.title: Count Zero Interrupt
blog.description:
A blog for all things cyberpunk, neon, 80s, and neo-80s.
Film, photography, music, video games, animation, and more.
"On receiving an interrupt, decrement the counter to zero."

summary: In 2077, they voted my city the worst place to live in America.  Main issues?  Sky-high rate of violence, and more people...
caption:
In 2077, they voted my city the worst place to live in America.  Main issues?  Sky-high rate of violence, and more people living below the poverty line than anywhere else.

Cyberpunk 2077

blog.name: strigital
blog.title: A WIZARD DID IT.
blog.description:
Personal art blog with occasional sidenotes about my writing. Call me Meg and forgive me my poor English (but feel free to talk to me in Russian or Lithuanian) 
Ask me anything, don't repost my stuff and please enjoy your stay at my lair (~˘▾˘)~ ♥

tags: and that tattoo on his arm?
he must've had one helluva wild youth
summary: did y’all notice ol’ ripper Vic is wearing a TT badge on his leg? now i can’t stop thinking about young and sassy Victor in...
body: did y’all notice ol’ ripper Vic is wearing a TT badge on his leg? now i can’t stop thinking about young and sassy Victor in Trauma Team, gun in one hand, pack of meds in another… kinda like Mordin Solus - a doctor who’s as likely to gun you down as he is to save your friggin’ life. i’m really starting to like the doc!

reblog.comment: did y’all notice ol’ ripper Vic is wearing a TT badge on his leg? now i can’t stop thinking about young and sassy Victor in Trauma Team, gun in one hand, pack of meds in another… kinda like Mordin Solus - a doctor who’s as likely to gun you down as he is to save your friggin’ life. i’m really starting to like the doc!
